director.name: 纳比勒·马利赫 Nabil Maleh

introduction: A simple peasant, he discovers that the power of feudalism is an extension of colonial power, while their land taken away, go to jail, and tortured, and humiliated and lost his dignity and treated Bouhcp tools of repression by the representative gendarmerie, come from prison and able to get his gun, and there begins the bloody struggle with the gendarmerie and the gangs feudalism, and starts in sympathy with the peasants, but their will is not strong, felt that the rebellion was Paliosn two individuals and nothing Vciian start peasants collective rebellion against feudalism.
